## 5. SAND
### Definition
Most generic term for the loose material consisting of small particles of mineral, shell, rock etc., distinguishable by the naked eye. Avoid terms for specific types or colour of sand. Avoid terms referring to "dust" or "dirt", where different. Avoid terms referring to soil type, where different. Avoid terms referring specifically to "beach" or "strand". (CoBL)
